replies.author: zz12341
replies.txt_content:
You put in water, I want to play a game with you, have a moderator in front of you, you go to him, he'll spray the key, can open the door at the end, you live or die, make your own choice.
你在末地，我就要和你玩一个游戏，你前面有一个版主，你去砍死他，他会喷钥匙，可以开启末地的大门，你生还是死，你自己做决定。
